ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
VisiData is a multipurpose terminal utility for exploring, cleaning,
restructuring and analysing tabular data. Current supported sources are
TSV, CSV, fixed-width text, JSON, SQLite, HTTP, HTML, .xls, and .xlsx
(Microsoft Excel).
about.summary: A terminal interface for exploring and arranging tabular data.

about.description:
VisiData is a multipurpose terminal utility for exploring, cleaning,
restructuring and analysing tabular data. Current supported sources are
TSV, CSV, fixed-width text, JSON, SQLite, HTTP, HTML, .xls, and .xlsx
(Microsoft Excel).
about.summary: A terminal interface for exploring and arranging tabular data.

name: visidata
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "visidata" %}
{% set version = "3.3" %}
{% set sha256 = "a94f4e398477e038541849cf4df1d1f2efc399da544d77db189bdb7f2fc014c4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - python-dateutil
    - requests
    - lxml
    - openpyxl
    - xlrd
    - setuptools

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  commands:
    - vd --version

about:
  home: https://github.com/saulpw/visidata
  license: GPL-3.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: {{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE
  summary: A terminal interface for exploring and arranging tabular data.

  description: |
    VisiData is a multipurpose terminal utility for exploring, cleaning,
    restructuring and analysing tabular data. Current supported sources are
    TSV, CSV, fixed-width text, JSON, SQLite, HTTP, HTML, .xls, and .xlsx
    (Microsoft Excel).
  doc_url: https://visidata.org/docs
  dev_url: https://github.com/saulpw/visidata

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - anjakefala
